sentences.en: Her face bent into the single wrinkle of the small, white neck. " You dream, you.

sentences.en: The newest wrinkle in the $ 2.5 billion cosmetics business is a lotion that camouflages creases.

sentences.en: The skin on her cheeks and around her eyes was beginning to wrinkle.

sentences.en: Wood rots, metal rusts, people wrinkle and flowers wither.

sentences.en: Years wrinkle the skin, but to give up enthusiasm wrinkles the soul.
sentences.cn: 当月使皮肤起了皱纹, 但如果失去热情,便会使灵魂起皱.

sentences.en: You can get Botox injections for that forehead wrinkle.

sentences.en: You know, my shirts will wrinkle if they aren't folded right away.
sentences.cn: 你知道,假如不马上叠的话, 我的衬衫会变得皱巴巴的.
